biotools.summary: CHARTS is a web application for characterizing and comparing tumor subpopulations in publicly available single-cell RNA-seq datasets. CHARTS is a web application, and associated backened analysis pipeline, for exploring publicly available single-cell RNA-seq data from human tumors.

bioschemas.name: CHARTS
